channel.title: [Public Alpha Testing] Project-RS-07 : The Next Big Remake
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://puu.sh/4QnOZ[/img]
[b]Exp. rate:[/b] Skilling x10 Combat x15
[img]http://puu.sh/533hY.png[/img][url=http://projectrs07.x10host.com/]Website[/url] | [img]http://puu.sh/533ko.png[/img][url=http://projectrs07.x10host.com/forums/]Forums[/url] | [img]http://puu.sh/533sw.png[/img][url=http://projectrs07.x10host.com/client.jar]Client[/url]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/533GG.png[/img][url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,652934.0.html]Click here to view the development thread for features[/url][IMG]http://puu.sh/533GG.png[/img]
I am currently releasing a public Alpha/Beta for testing purposes. You may join and get a head start in training as you [b][COLOR=green]WILL[/COLOR][/B] be able to keep your stats and items after Alpha testing is over. Please post your bug reports and suggestions on the forums only! Once I am able to afford a VPS and a paid .com domain, I will begin buying advertisement. Until then, come and get a head start today.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lz-W4-MlT0Y[/youtube]
[i]Enchanted bolt effects.[/i] [img]http://puu.sh/4UV14.png[/img]
[i]Redemption healing.[/i] [img]http://puu.sh/4UUSF.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/504Jt.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/5061s.png[/img]

item.title: [Public Alpha Testing] Project-RS-07 : The Next Big Remake
item.dc:creator: @RS_From_The_00s RS From The 00s
item.description:
@RS_From_The_00s wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:14, topic:534882”]Please refrain from reposting your comment in order to bump your thread.
Thanks, and good luck with your server.[/quote]

It’s allowed if it’s not all the time. I do it every 2 days. There is a post where one of the global moderators said it was okay. I can’t find it now but how else am I supposed to post updates. :o

Madera has kindly purchased us a VPS. Should be up and running tomorrow.

Read full topic

New forums, not too keen on the old ones.

item.title: [Public Alpha Testing] Project-RS-07 : The Next Big Remake
item.dc:creator: @RS_From_The_00s RS From The 00s
item.description:
@RS_From_The_00s wrote:

[quote=“ownerbasgar, post:10, topic:534882”]I’m realllyy in love on the server

But i think the xp rate has to be higher i think its a bit slow but its alright[/quote]
Thanks. It has taken about a week for one player to get level 900 so I think that’s relatively good going. It is a remake after all, but not so much of a pain in the arse to start over again.

New client with auto cache downloader: http://projectrs07.x10host.com/client.jar

Read full topic

item.title: [Public Alpha Testing] Project-RS-07 : The Next Big Remake
item.dc:creator: @RS_From_The_00s RS From The 00s
item.description:
@RS_From_The_00s wrote:

[quote=“CoderOops, post:8, topic:534882”][quote author=JavaTC link=topic=653681.msg4379432#msg4379432 date=1383075938]
I don’t think some of these pictures are yours but perhaps it’s my imagination.
[/quote]
He has development topic, some of the pictures are from there.[/quote]

Ah, I guess that’s where he got it from. Or if he means some picture are of a character “Madera”, then that’s my current moderator in game.

Had nothing but good feed back about the quality of the game so far, issues with the free hosting of course, but that is only for the duration of Alpha. The sooner I can get it up on a VPS the sooner it can begin to gather a larger player base.

Read full topic
